definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
to pull up/to pull out/to draw out by suction/to select/to pick/to stand out (above level)/to surpass/to seize

sentences.english: Elevational and latitudinal trends were not pronounced.
sentences.chinese: 海拔和緯度的變化趨勢不明顯。

sentences.english: Objective In order to study the effect of altitude on lipid peroxidation and anti-oxidation system.
sentences.chinese: 探討海拔高度對機體脂質過氧化與抗氧化系統的影響。

sentences.english: Upslope fog is usually dense, and extends to high altitudes.
sentences.chinese: 上坡霧通常是密集，並延伸到高海拔地區。

sentences.english: Western China is characterized by high-altitude airfields and extreme hot and cold climate conditions.
sentences.chinese: 中國西部有着典型的高海拔機場和極端溫度環境。

sentences.english: The maximum elevation of 650 meters or more, is that the so-called pampas area.
sentences.chinese: 海拔650公尺以上的最高處是所謂的彭巴草原區。

sentences.english: The samples of Agkistrodon from high altitude regions of both Gansu and Shaanxi Provinces probably should be referred to A. strauchi.
sentences.chinese: 甘肅和陝西高海拔地區的蝮蛇標本可能同屬於高原蝮。

sentences.english: Highest point for Xianglufeng, altitude 557 metres, commonly known as " devilishly hard to achieve."
sentences.chinese: 最高點爲香爐峯，海拔557米，俗稱“鬼見愁”。

sentences.english: Officials say its the highest drainage project of its kind in the world.
sentences.chinese: 官方人員稱，這是世界上海拔最高的排水工程。

sentences.english: He told me that his village was 4000above sealevel.
sentences.chinese: 他告訴我他的村莊位於海拔在4000米以上。

sentences.english: The East Village tip, 1002 meters above sea level, the hillside village head.
sentences.chinese: 東面有寨頭尖，海拔1002米，山腰爲寨頭嶺。

sentences.english: Carbohydrates may not be metabolised effectively at altitude.
sentences.chinese: 醣類在高海拔時的代謝效率可能沒有那麼高。

sentences.english: Badaling is a hill about 1000 meters above sea level.
sentences.chinese: 八達嶺是一座海拔1000米左右的小山。

sentences.english: But most of this energy is at high altitude.
sentences.chinese: 然而，大部分風能潛藏在高海拔區域。

sentences.english: Seed bearing rate in fertile period gets better from low elevation to high elevation.
sentences.chinese: 可育期內繁種結實性是隨海拔增高由低到高。

sentences.english: It feels like a high-altitude Garden of Eden .
sentences.chinese: 人們似乎感覺置身於高海拔的伊甸園中。

sentences.english: Its highest peak rises abruptly from a plain to 3099 m. above sea level.
sentences.chinese: 它的最高峯突立平原之上，海拔3099米。

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
abbr. for 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰, Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
